S2S Lab 1 1 Welcome to S2S Lectures

S2S Lab 1 1 Welcome to S2S Lectures The lectures will cover material from the textbook Probability and Statistics with R by Ugarte, Militino and Arnholt. Be sure to do the pre-lecture reading for each lecture to get the most out of the lectures. It the pre-lecture reading material that's examinable, not just the lecture material Post questions in advance that you'd like answered in the lecture All the pre-lecture reading and links are on S2S Moodle page. We may use Mentimeter to gather class responses during lectures via menti.com. The first lecture covers material from Chapter 2 Exploring Data and in particular 2.1 What Is Statistics? 2.2 Data 2.5 Summary Measures of Location 2.6 Summary Measures of Spread
